creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Mark K. Kim
description: chest with hinge on front; door on front swings downward to open; pairs of metal handles at sides and on door; large decorative handle on bottom panel on front; applied metal sheets with geometric openwork designs on front; large lock included
title: Sung Sun I Style Bandaji (Storage Chest) from Pakch'ŏn County, southern North P'yŏngan province, North Korea
